channel.title: This is crazy
channel.description:
Hey, my name is James Osborne, but people call me Jimmy. I don't think this community knows me that well, but I'm in some serious trouble.
Well me and my friends did some works bombs on school campus and they got the police involved. I got arrested at school on Tuesday (01/29/08). They cuffed me and drove me to the adult jail. They brought me to this room where I was cuffed to the wall for about 4 hours at least. They finally came in and uncuffed me for questioning. I told my side of the story and was told that they were counting what I did as a felony and charging me as an adult. They told me that I might get anywhere from 5 years to life in prison. I stayed in jail overnight with Billy Montgomery and Josh Morton; these were the other people involved. Luckily we all had a cell together and were in a special part of the jail because we are underage. On Wednesday (01/30/08), we waited about half of the day and finally the judge called to get us bonds (to get out of jail). They took us to this room and made us change into prisoner jumpsuits. We were taken to another part and they shackled our ankles and cuffed our hands. We got driven in a van with some other criminals in it to the judge. He ended up giving us all bonds of 3,500 dollars. Luckily Billy's uncle was a bondsman and he was already ready to get us out. He had already sorted our bonds and let us go without paying anything until later. We were supposed to have to pay 10% of it to get out of jail, but we didn't have to pay yet. So right now I'm out of jail. My court date is in May. I'm only 16, but they are charging me as an adult because it's a felony. So, I can get 5 years through life in prison. A lot of people told me that they will probably go easier on us because we aren't even 18 yet. I hope they lessen the charge, then maybe we could get probation or house arrest rather than going to prison. My police report and charge paper said "Bomb or explosive of mass destruction." Which is a complete exaggeration, it was a small bottle exploding. Anyway, all I can do right now is wait till May, then I go to court and they decide what they are going to do. But I might get life in prison....
Please wish me luck everyone. I'm only 16, life in prison would ruin my life.
It's been on the news a few times, it showed our mugshots and stuff. I can't find a vid of it with the mugshots, but I have a news video.
http://youtube.com/watch?v=mtP9T-VALh4
and a news story
http://wcbi.com/news/index.php?hash=4196959ab313d793c3836e70762e2c67&mnid=2034&page=

item.title: This is crazy
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:17, topic:177554”][quote author=error.login link=topic=238475.msg2025880#msg2025880 date=1201900177]

Good luck, but can they prove you did make a bomb.
And why not say it was a school project and you are not a terrorist.

or dress up as sadam, now that would be hilairous
[/quote]
Yes, they can’t put dead people in prison.[/quote]
He’s not dead I can prove it
Good luck, Jimmy.

Read full topic

And said you’re moving with your aunte and uncle in bel-air
[/quote]

Your serious.[/quote]

Nice one month bump.

I just thought of something. If he’s a felon, and he’s posting on here. He’s probably brought publicity. Jimmy, if you get on the News, like interview or something. Say something about moparisthebest man.

Rofl, what would there be to say about this community? “I learned how to hack RuneScape!? Moparisthebest pwnz”
[/quote]

Yeh, something like that. Or be like, “I wanna give a shout out to my niggaz at Moparishtbest.com”. Omfg, I would die. I’m serious, if you did that, I would suffocate.[/quote]

Lemme see if I can arrange an interview. JK.

item.title: This is crazy
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Tico135:

Also, the punishment is a little much. Life in prison for making a little experiment? Sure maybe a little fine, but nothing more. That is honestly the stupidest shit I’ve ever heard.

That’s because they were trying to scare them. Police always use scare tactics - it works great on the uninformed (like this jimmy).

A bomb is technically a device that explodes, but bombs also generally expell a large shockwave.
Yours didn’t do the latter.

Regardless of that definition though, any ambulance chasing lawyer worth his ass in peanuts could probably get you out of this armed with a small amount of information regarding explosives and their nature.

Read full topic
